title: umA mahEshvarAtmajam gajAnanam
sahitya:
umA mahEshvarAtmajam gajAnanam bhajAmahE UrIkrta gAna sandAyakam gaNanAyakam suravara vinutam


anupallavi

  utamOttamAgama prasiddha vAraNam urasilOla pannagOpavIta bhUSaNam nindidEndu mandahAsa 
mangaLAnanam niravadhika krpAkaram nikhila jana manOharam kanakagiri nibhAkaram kaivalya sudhAkaram 


caraNam    cintita phaladam udAra shIlam shivakaralOlam bhakta paripAlam shrIman mahAbhAratha lEkana 
karajAlam shashAnka varNa kapOlam dEvarAja parAshara mAnAyata nArada sEvita gaNanAtham sthimita 
madavAri pUraka karNa yugaLa vElana madhukara matta sangItam nijamukha bOdham nIraja pAdam 
praNava nAdam samOdam mOdaka karam mUSika turanga mOhana taranga mudAkara sAgaram
